lines:
hoo23 Mellen Street,

Cambidge Man

1986

Dear Mr. Steado;

Here with, I enclose 
egen Luke's recept which you 
"told me to set it falk,

I have nothing to 
tell you but with 
pleasant Ruummer

Sincerely you

85. quan

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter enclosing Luk's receipt as requested. He wishes Stearns a pleasant summer.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
